    SRealJointVariable

    public class GibbsRealJoint
extends SRealJointVariableBase
implements ISolverVariableGibbs, ISolverRealVariableGibbs, IRealSamplerClient
    RealJoint-valued solver variable for Gibbs solver.

      • getEventMask

        protected int getEventMask()
        Description copied from class: SolverEventSource
        Return mask of flag bits that are used to determine whether to generate events. This is used by SolverEventSource.notifyListenerChanged() to clear the specified flag bits. It is assumed that the value of all zeros indicates that the object needs to recompute its flags based on the listener.

        The default implementation returns zero.

        Overriders should usually combine local value with value from super class using bitwise or, e.g.: 

            return ThisClass.EVENT_MASK | super.getEventMask();
        Overrides:
        getEventMask in class SNode

      • setSampler

        public final void setSampler(ISampler sampler)
        Sets sampler to be used for this variable.

        In general, it is usually easier to configure the sampler using the GibbsOptions.realSampler option. This method should only be required when the sampler class is not registered with the generic sampler registry for the current environment.

        Parameters:
        sampler - is a non-null sampler.

      • setSampler

        @Deprecated
public final void setSampler(java.lang.String samplerName)
        Deprecated. Will be removed in future release. Instead set sampler by setting GibbsOptions.realSampler option using LocalOptionHolder.setOption(com.analog.lyric.options.IOptionKey<T>, T).
